resources.string: 1. You are too light. You need more fat to protect your organ.\n
1. You keep you BMI great. Keep on. Some abs exercise is helpful too. Or do some Dragon-Flag like Bruce Lee.\n
1. You are over weight. You need to do more exercise. Buy a pair of new Shoes like Brooks, and start running.\n
Do you think you got enough salary?

Yes, I can earn my life.

2. It seems you need some more money. How about gain some Android skills to be an Android Developer and earn your new life?\n
2. You are living good. But sometimes we need adventures. Why not try to make an Android App to fill your part-time?\n
2. Awesome, you are rich! Maybe you want invest on some useful project. Like some Indie Android Developer.
3. Wish you love each other day by day. Spend more time with him/her. He/She may be your soul mate.\n
3. Enjoy your single time. At last, you will hate each other. Single time is precious.\n
4. Correct, but diversity of food is also important.\n

Yes, I had a dream one day.
5. Glad to hear that, for life goal really maters. It will guide your life when you\'re confused or under great pressure. Keep on moving. Wish you have the courage to get through the difficulties.\n
5. Don\'t be afraid. Try every thing just like Judy did in Zootopia. You are more powerful than you think.\n
